verses.verse: וַ֭יַּעַן <WH6030> Then answered בִּלְדַּ֥ד <WH1085> Bildad הַשּׁוּחִ֗י <WH7747> the Shuhite וַיֹאמַֽר׃ <WH559> and said

עַד־ <WH5704> long אָ֥ן <WH575> How תְּמַלֶּל־ <WH4448> wilt thou speak אֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> these וְר֥וּחַ <WH7307> air כַּ֝בִּיר <WH3524> [be like] a strong אִמְרֵי־ <WH561> these [things]? and [how long shall] the words פִֽיךָ׃ <WH6310> of thy mouth
הַ֭אֵל <WH410> Doth God יְעַוֵּ֣ת <WH5791> pervert מִשְׁפָּ֑ט <WH4941> adversary וְאִם־ <WH518> does שַׁ֝דַּ֗י <WH7706> the Almighty יְעַוֵּֽת־ <WH5791> pervert צֶֽדֶק׃ <WH6664> what

אִם־ <WH518> If בָּנֶ֥יךָ <WH1121> If thy children חָֽטְאוּ־ <WH2398> have sinned ל֑וֹ וַֽ֝יְשַׁלְּחֵ֗ם <WH7971> against him and he have cast them away בְּיַד־ <WH3027> for פִּשְׁעָֽם׃ <WH6588> their transgression

אִם־ <WH518> If אַ֭תָּה <WH859> you תְּשַׁחֵ֣ר <WH7836> betimes אֶל־ <WH413> about אֵ֑ל <WH410> unto God וְאֶל־ <WH413> of שַׁ֝דַּ֗י <WH7706> to the Almighty תִּתְחַנָּֽן׃ <WH2603> and make thy supplication

אִם־ <WH518> If זַ֥ךְ <WH2134> If thou [wert] pure וְיָשָׁ֗ר <WH3477> and upright אָ֥תָּה <WH859> you כִּי־ <WH3588> Surely עַ֭תָּה <WH6258> now יָעִ֣יר <WH5782> surely now he would awake עָלֶ֑יךָ <WH5921> and וְ֝שִׁלַּ֗ם <WH7999> prosperous נְוַ֣ת <WH5116> for thee and make the habitation צִדְקֶֽךָ׃ <WH6664> of thy righteousness

וְהָיָ֣ה <WH1961> become רֵאשִׁיתְךָ֣ <WH7225> Though thy beginning מִצְעָ֑ר <WH4705> was small וְ֝אַחֲרִיתְךָ֗ <WH319> yet thy latter end יִשְׂגֶּ֥ה <WH7685> increase מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> should greatly כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for שְׁאַל־ <WH7592> ask counsel
נָ֭א <WH4994> Please לְדֹ֣ר <WH1755> age רִישׁ֑וֹן <WH7223> of past וְ֝כוֹנֵ֗ן <WH3559> and prepare לְחֵ֣קֶר <WH2714> thyself to the search אֲבוֹתָֽם׃ <WH1> of their fathers

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Because תְמ֣וֹל <WH8543> (For we [are but of] yesterday אֲ֭נַחְנוּ <WH587> we וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> nothing נֵדָ֑ע <WH3045> and know כִּ֤י <WH3588> Because צֵ֖ל <WH6738> A shadow יָמֵ֣ינוּ <WH3117> nothing because our days עֲלֵי־ <WH5921> on אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> upon earth

הֲלֹא־ <WH3808> not הֵ֣ם <WH1992> like י֭וֹרוּךָ <WH3384> Shall not they teach יֹ֣אמְרוּ <WH559> thee [and] tell לָ֑ךְ וּ֝מִלִּבָּ֗ם <WH3820> care for יוֹצִ֥אוּ <WH3318> thee and utter מִלִּֽים׃ <WH4405> words

הֲיִֽגְאֶה־ <WH1342> grow up גֹּ֭מֶא <WH1573> Can the rush בְּלֹ֣א <WH3808> without בִצָּ֑ה <WH1207> swamp יִשְׂגֶּה־ <WH7685> grow אָ֥חוּ <WH260> the flag בְלִי־ <WH1097> without מָֽיִם׃ <WH4325> waste

עֹדֶ֣נּוּ <WH5750> is still בְ֭אִבּוֹ <WH3> Whilst it [is] yet in his greenness לֹ֣א <WH3808> not יִקָּטֵ֑ף <WH6998> [and] not cut down וְלִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> before כָל־ <WH3605> any חָצִ֣יר <WH2682> any [other] herb יִיבָֽשׁ׃ <WH3001> it withereth

כֵּ֗ן <WH3651> So אָ֭רְחוֹת <WH734> So [are] the paths כָּל־ <WH3605> of all שֹׁ֣כְחֵי <WH7911> of all that forget אֵ֑ל <WH410> God וְתִקְוַ֖ת <WH8615> hope חָנֵ֣ף <WH2611> and the hypocrite's תֹּאבֵֽד׃ <WH6> shall perish
אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> Whose יָק֥וֹט <WH6990> shall be cut off כִּסְל֑וֹ <WH3689> Whose hope וּבֵ֥ית <WH1004> web עַ֝כָּבִ֗ישׁ <WH5908> [shall be] a spider's מִבְטַחֽוֹ׃ <WH4009> and whose trust

יִשָּׁעֵ֣ן <WH8172> He shall lean עַל־ <WH5921> in בֵּ֭יתוֹ <WH1004> upon his house וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> does not יַעֲמֹ֑ד <WH5975> but it shall not stand יַחֲזִ֥יק <WH2388> he shall hold בּ֝֗וֹ וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> does not יָקֽוּם׃ <WH6965> it fast but it shall not endure

רָטֹ֣ב <WH7373> He [is] green ה֭וּא <WH1931> he לִפְנֵי־ <WH6440> before שָׁ֑מֶשׁ <WH8121> the sun וְעַ֥ל <WH5921> over גַּ֝נָּת֗וֹ <WH1593> in his garden יֹֽנַקְתּ֥וֹ <WH3127> and his branch תֵצֵֽא׃ <WH3318> shooteth forth
עַל־ <WH5921> and גַּ֭ל <WH1530> the heap שָֽׁרָשָׁ֣יו <WH8328> His roots יְסֻבָּ֑כוּ <WH5440> are wrapped about בֵּ֖ית <WH1004> the place אֲבָנִ֣ים <WH68> of stones יֶחֱזֶֽה׃ <WH2372> [and] seeth

אִם־ <WH518> If יְבַלְּעֶ֥נּוּ <WH1104> If he destroy מִמְּקוֹמ֑וֹ <WH4725> him from his place וְכִ֥חֶשׁ <WH3584> then [it] shall deny בּ֝֗וֹ לֹ֣א <WH3808> never רְאִיתִֽיךָ׃ <WH7200> him [saying] I have not seen

הֶן־ <WH2005> Behold ה֭וּא <WH1931> this מְשׂ֣וֹשׂ <WH4885> Behold this [is] the joy דַּרְכּ֑וֹ <WH1870> of his way וּ֝מֵעָפָ֗ר <WH6083> and out of the earth אַחֵ֥ר <WH312> shall others יִצְמָֽחוּ׃ <WH6779> grow

הֶן־ <WH2005> Lo אֵ֭ל <WH410> Behold God לֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor יִמְאַס־ <WH3988> will not cast away תָּ֑ם <WH8535> a perfect וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> Nor יַ֝חֲזִ֗יק <WH2388> aid בְּיַד־ <WH3027> able מְרֵעִֽים׃ <WH7489> the evil doers
עַד־ <WH5704> will yet יְמַלֵּ֣ה <WH4390> Till he fill שְׂח֣וֹק <WH7814> with laughing פִּ֑יךָ <WH6310> thy mouth וּשְׂפָתֶ֥יךָ <WH8193> and thy lips תְרוּעָֽה׃ <WH8643> with rejoicing

שֹׂנְאֶ֥יךָ <WH8130> They that hate יִלְבְּשׁוּ־ <WH3847> thee shall be clothed בֹ֑שֶׁת <WH1322> with shame וְאֹ֖הֶל <WH168> and the dwelling רְשָׁעִ֣ים <WH7563> place of the wicked אֵינֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH369> shall come to nought פ
